sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_DISPLAY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ||'-'|| F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_DISPLAY_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , F.LAT , F.LNG , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM061', F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F E WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = E.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'E'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sAssetsCd#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #sAssetsSubCd#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND E.LOC LIKE '%' || #searchLoc# || '%'
ORDER BY F.GIS_ASSETS_CD DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F E WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = E.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'E'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sAssetsCd#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #sAssetsSubCd#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND E.LOC LIKE '%' || #searchLoc# || '%'

SELECT F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE2 , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_NM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_NM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , TO_CHAR(F.LA_CRDNT) LA_CRDNT , TO_CHAR(F.LO_CRDNT) LO_CRDNT , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , E.PRPOS , E.CAPA , E.VOLT , E.OUTPUT , E.FMT , E.STNDRD , TO_CHAR(E.INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(E.MFC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MFC_DT , E.MFC_CMPNY , E.MANAGER , E.USAGE_ENTRPS , E.DUCT_LINE_LT , E.CABLE_EXT , E.LIGHTWR_HT , E.QY , E.FUEL_CONSUM , E.FUEL_TANK , E.OIL_QTY , E.FNL_MTHD , E.SPPLY_PWR , E.SPPLY_TR , E.KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN , E.SECTION_FROM , E.SECTION_TO , E.PREMAIN_HT , E.PREMAIN_STNDRD , E.PREMAIN_QY , E.LIGHTAPP_FMT , E.LIGHTAPP_STNDRD , E.LIGHTAPP_QY , E.LAMP_FMT , E.LAMP_CAPA , E.LAMP_QY , E.LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY , E.LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD , E.LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY , E.LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD , E.RM , E.FCLTS_MNG_NO , E.LOC , E.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = E.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO_NM , E.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = E.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD) ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F INNER JOIN ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F E ON F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = E.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , PRPOS , CAPA , VOLT , OUTPUT , FMT , STNDRD , INSTL_DT , MFC_DT , MFC_CMPNY , MANAGER , USAGE_ENTRPS , DUCT_LINE_LT , CABLE_EXT , LIGHTWR_HT , QY , FUEL_CONSUM , FUEL_TANK , OIL_QTY , FNL_MTHD , SPPLY_PWR , SPPLY_TR , KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN , SECTION_FROM , SECTION_TO , PREMAIN_HT , PREMAIN_STNDRD , PREMAIN_QY , LIGHTAPP_FMT , LIGHTAPP_STNDRD , LIGHTAPP_QY , LAMP_FMT , LAMP_CAPA , LAMP_QY , LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY , LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD , LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY , LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD , RM , LOC , ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# || #gisAssetsCd# || #gisAssetsSubCd# || #gisPrtFcltyCd# || #gisPrtFcltySeq# || #prtFcltySe# , #prpos# , #capa# , #volt# , #output# , #fmt# , #stndrd# , #instlDt# , #mfcDt# , #mfcCmpny# , #manager# , #usageEntrps# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#ductLineLt#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#cableExt#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrHt#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qy#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fuelConsum#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fuelTank#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#oilQty#, ',', '')) , #fnlMthd# , #spplyPwr# , #spplyTr# , #korElecSubstn# , #sectionFrom# , #sectionTo# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#premainHt#, ',', '')) , #premainStndrd# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#premainQy#, ',', '')) , #lightappFmt# , #lightappStndrd# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightappQy#, ',', '')) , #lampFmt# , #lampCapa# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lampQy#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrLightappQy#, ',', '')) , #lightwrLightappClcd# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrLampQy#, ',', '')) , #lightwrLampClcd# , #rm# , #loc# , #archFcltsMngNo# , #elctyFcltsClCd# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F SET PRPOS = #prpos# , CAPA = #capa# , VOLT = #volt# , OUTPUT = #output# , FMT = #fmt# , STNDRD = #stndrd# , INSTL_DT = #instlDt# , MFC_DT = #mfcDt# , MFC_CMPNY = #mfcCmpny# , MANAGER = #manager# , USAGE_ENTRPS = #usageEntrps# , DUCT_LINE_LT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#ductLineLt#, ', ', '')) , CABLE_EXT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#cableExt#, ', ', '')) , LIGHTWR_HT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrHt#, ', ', '')) , QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qy#, ', ', '')) , FUEL_CONSUM = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fuelConsum#, ', ', '')) , FUEL_TANK = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fuelTank#, ', ', '')) , OIL_QTY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#oilQty#, ', ', '')) , FNL_MTHD = #fnlMthd# , SPPLY_PWR = #spplyPwr# , SPPLY_TR = #spplyTr# , KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN = #korElecSubstn# , SECTION_FROM = #sectionFrom# , SECTION_TO = #sectionTo# , PREMAIN_HT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#premainHt#, ', ', '')) , PREMAIN_STNDRD = #premainStndrd# , PREMAIN_QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#premainQy#, ', ', '')) , LIGHTAPP_FMT = #lightappFmt# , LIGHTAPP_STNDRD = #lightappStndrd# , LIGHTAPP_QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightappQy#, ', ', '')) , LAMP_FMT = #lampFmt# , LAMP_CAPA = #lampCapa# , LAMP_QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lampQy#, ', ', '')) , LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrLightappQy#, ', ', '')) , LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD = #lightwrLightappClcd# , LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrLampQy#, ', ', '')) , LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD = #lightwrLampClcd# , RM = #rm# , LOC = #loc# , ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO = #archFcltsMngNo# , ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD = #elctyFcltsClCd# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , (CASE WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'D' THEN '문서' WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'P' THEN '사진' WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'Z' THEN '기타' END) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(ATCH_FILE_SEQ),0) + 1) FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
INSERT INTO FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngNo# , TO_NUMBER(#maxAtchFileSeq#) , #atchFileSe# , #atchFileSj# , #atchFileNmLogic# , #atchFileNmPhysicl# , TO_DATE(#atchFileWritngDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F SET ATCH_FILE_SE = #atchFileSe# , ATCH_FILE_SJ = #atchFileSj# , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC = #atchFileNmLogic# , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL = #atchFileNmPhysicl# , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT = #atchFileWritngDt# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
